AlreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Log in here
Author: Author
ConfirmDeletionOfCollection: Are you sure you want to delete the collection "{{name}}"?
ConfirmDeletionOfFile: Do you really want to delete the file?
ConfirmDeletionOfModel: Are you sure you want to delete the model "{{name}}"?
Cults3DImportInfoText:
The Cults3D ID can be found in the URL, e.g. the URL https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/art/doctor-who-onmioji contains the ID 'doctor-who-onmioji'.
TODO: Session und nur kostenlose Modelle per Auto-Order
EmailSentMessage: A verification email has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.
EmailVerifiedMessage: Your email has been verified successfully. You can now log in to your account.
FileListHint:
To display changes after saving, please reload the page.
For display on the website, the image at position 1 (or the one with the lowest number) is used.
ForceOverwriteWithUploadedFile: Force overwrite file if it exists on server
ImportableSources:
Links from the following sources can be processed: {{sources}}.
One link per line.
InstructablesImportInfoText: Currently, no automatic processable identifier can be found from the URL or other information visible on the page. The Instructable https://www.instructables.com/Lighted-3D-Moon-Phase-Clock/ has the ID EVLRJPCKUL8MOTU and must be retrieved from the network analysis (press F12 in the browser).
InvitationTokenHint: You need an invitation token from an administrator to register.
MakerWorldImportInfoText:
The MakerWorld ID can be found in the URL, e.g. the URL https://makerworld.com/en/models/54321 contains the ID '54321'.
TODO Session nötig
MyMiniFactoryImportInfoText: The MyMiniFactory ID can be found in the URL, e.g. the URL https://www.myminifactory.com/object/3d-print-ino-and-melicertes-at-the-palace-of-versailles-france-12345 contains the ID '12345'.
Name: Name
PasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
PrintablesImportInfoText: The Printables ID can be found in the URL, e.g. the URL https://www.printables.com/model/123456-print-in-place-rotating-hearts-bracelet contains the ID '123456'.
RedirectAfterImport: Redirect to the imported model after import?
RegistrationDisabledMessage: Registration is currently disabled. Please contact the administrator.
RegistrationModeHint: The registration mode is configured in the server configuration file.
RegistrationSuccessMessage: Thank you for registering. We have sent a verification email to your address. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.
ResendVerificationInfo: If you haven't received a verification email or your link has expired, you can request a new verification email here.
SetMainModelCollection: Set as main model of this collection (Collection image, ...)
SketchfabImportInfoText:
The Sketchfab ID can be found in the URL, e.g. the URL https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/k9-doctors-who-dog-746aff4a91c246329e64dbd2f0f65313 contains the ID '746aff4a91c246329e64dbd2f0f65313'.
If the model creator does not allow downloading, this import cannot download any 3D model, it will import metadata and images.
If access is disabled by the administrator downloads of 3D models are also not possible.
SupportedRepositories: Currently models can be imported from: Thingiverse, MyMiniFactory, Cults (Cults3D) and (not always) TinkerCAD
ThingiverseImportInfoText: The Thingiverse ID can be found in the URL, e.g. the URL https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:1234 contains the ID '1234'.
Title: Title

error.VideoDoesntWork: The video does not seem to be playable in this browser. You can download it in the file overview.

backend.CollectionCouldNotBeDeleted: The collection could not be removed.
backend.CollectionCouldNotBeSet: The collection could not be set.
backend.CollectionUpdateFailed: The collection data could not be updated on the server.
backend.CollectionsNotReceived: The models' collections could not be received.
backend.EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: An account with this email address already exists.
backend.EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Please verify your email address before logging in.
backend.EMAIL_SEND_FAILED: Failed to send email. Please try again later.
backend.FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to access this resource.
backend.FileNotFoundOnStorage: The file could not be found in the server's storage
backend.INVALID_INPUT: Please fill in all required fields.
backend.INVALID_INVITATION_TOKEN: The invitation token is invalid, expired, or has already been used.
backend.INVALID_OR_EXPIRED_TOKEN: The verification link is invalid or has expired.
backend.INVITATION_TOKEN_REQUIRED: An invitation token is required to register.
backend.MISSING_SESSION_ID: The Cults3D session id is missing. Please add it.
backend.ModelUpdateFailed: The model data could not be updated on the server.
backend.ServerDidNotAnswer: The server didn't answer in time. Your connection is to slow or the server is down.
backend.TagCouldNotBeDeleted: The tag could not be deleted.
backend.TagCouldNotBeSet: The tag could not be set.
backend.TagsNotReceived: The models' tags could not be received.
backend.USER_DATA_INCORRECT: The e-mail address or password you entered were wrong. Could not login.

validation.EnterValidEmail: Enter a valid e-mail address, please.
validation.PasswordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long.

toast.ModelCreated: The model "{{name}}" has been created successfully.
